blocks.data:
Updates a *Coupon*.


**Read Only Fields**

* `id`
* `num_uses`
* `date_created`

**Notes**

If the `applies_to` value is cleared, you can restore it to the coupon by reapplying the `applies_to` value in a new `PUT` request.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Marketing | modify | `store_v2_marketing` |
|  Marketing | read-only | `store_v2_marketing_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

amount.description: The discount to apply to an order, as either an amount or a percentage. This field's usage is determined by the coupon `type`. For example, a `type` of + `percentage_discount` would determine a percentage here.

min_purchase.description: Specifies a minimum value that an order must have before the coupon can be applied to it.

expires.description: Specifies when a coupon expires. Coupons need not have an expiry date – you can also control expiry via + `max_uses` or `max_uses_per_customer`. If you do use this date field, the value must be in RFC 2822 format.

enabled.description: If the coupon is enabled, this field's value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.

code.description: The coupon code that customers will use to receive their discounts. Value must be unique. Only letters, numbers, white space, underscores, and hyphens are allowed.

applies_to.description: If it is not included in the PUT request, its existing value on the coupon will be cleared. Also required to be set on the POST request

ids.description: ID of either the products or categories

entity.description: What the discount applies to. Can be products or categories.

max_uses.description: Maximum number of times this coupon can be used.

max_uses_per_customer.description: Maximum number of times each customer can use this coupon.

shipping_methods.description: This is a list of shipping-method names. A shipping method must be enabled on the store to use it with a coupon. To check which shipping methods are enabled, please use the [List Shipping Methods](/api/v2#list-shipping-methods) endpoint.

id.description: The coupon's ID. This is a read-only field; do not set or modify its value in a POST or PUT request.

num_uses.description: Number of times this coupon has been used. This is a read-only field; do not set or modify its value in a POST or PUT request.
